It&#x27;s clear that 2020 was somewhat of a false start into this decade and has arguably completely changed everyone&#x27;s lives for the long term. (If not permanently).<p>This time, it seems that my crystal ball is lacking inspiration for 2021 due to the uncertainty caused by this year.')
